attributes.description:
Service plan up to 27 March 2027 or 90 000Km.
Warranty up to 26 March 2025 or 120 000Km.

Features:
Satellite Navigation,
Touch Screen Display,
Lane Change Assist,
Reverse Camera,
Towbar with Towbar Step,
Diff Lock,
Keyless function,
Electric Seats,
18 Inch Alloys,
2 x USB Input,
Black Leather with Cloth and Orange Stitching Seats,
Bluetooth,
Cruise Control,
Fog Lights,
Folding Mirrors,
Front and Rear Park Distance Control,
Multi Function Steering Wheel,
Roof Rails,
Rubberized Bin,
Smash and Grab,
Xenon Headlights.

Whether it is towing a trailer load of furniture between homes or a caravan to a weekend away, the Ranger Wildtrack is up for any job you put in front of it. All while being the heavy-duty work-horse you may need, this Bakkie sports inner-city maneuverability with Front and Rear Park Distance control, a reverse camera, and park pilot for those tight spaces. 

Not many pick-ups will offer this level of trim and road presence with the muscle to boast. Find out about getting approved today. 

Nationwide Delivery.
T&C's Apply.
